description: Data was extracted from GDC on February 2017. Masked Copy Number Segments was generated by selecting the fields marked masked and the data was generated using the Affymetrix Genome Wide SNP 6.0 array and the GDC workflow. More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Bioinformatics_Pipelines/CNV_Pipeline/
friendlyName: TCGA HG38 COPY NUMBER SEGMENT MASKED

fields.description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; e.g. TCGA-OV, etc.
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-DX-A8BN
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: Chromosome, possible values: chr1-22, and chrX
fields.name: chromosome

fields.description: 1-based start chromosome position of CN segment start-position
fields.name: start_pos

fields.description: Number of probes in the SNP array used to infer this CN segment
fields.name: num_probes

fields.description: Mean CN value for this segment -- the value is base2 log(CN/2), centered at 0.
fields.name: segment_mean

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode).  Can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this:   https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba9
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this aliquot (corresponds to the aliquot_barcode), eg 7fbfdb3e-1fd2-4206-8d2e-7f68e4a15844  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: aliquot_gdc_id

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode)  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba16
fields.name: file_gdc_id
